TutorialMessages.MoveTheArrowKeys: Use the arrow keys to move the tiles.
TutorialMessages.CombineTheBlocks: The tiles all moved in the same direction and a new one appeared.
TutorialMessages.JoinTheNumbers: Tiles with the same number join when they touch.
TutorialMessages.YouDoIt: You’re getting the hang of it!
TutorialMessages.UseUndo: If you make mistakes, you can use undo. Try it out!
TutorialMessages.UseSwap: Undo isn’t the only powerup you can use. Try “Swap Two Tiles”!
